xml.body:
@r349@
Most honorable ffather unavysydly as god shall save
me : I have offendyd yowr grace ; And I thynke nott
the contrary : butt thatt summe bakk ffrend : hath
don unto me : more hurt and hynderawnce
then I have att yowr graces hand deservyd : ffor I
know well In myne owne conscyence : I have
no thyng so hygly offendyd : as I doo perceyve
thatt yowr grace ys Infformyd off me : In good
ffaygthe I speke hytt off my conscyence And beffore
god : I wold I were under grownd : ffor now
have I lost thatt : which I never thought to lose
a gen : ye thatt : off whom had : I was as
gladd : as ever I was off beneffytt receyvyd
In thys world as knowythe my salvyour christ
Jhesus : who preserve your grace
Yowrs William
Gardner
